senses.sense_definition: Any jelly fungus belonging to the genus Tremella, typically characterized by a gelatinous texture and found growing on wood or other fungi.

examples.text: The biologist identified the bright yellow growth on the rotting log as a common species of <w>tremella</w>.
In culinary traditions, the white <w>tremella</w> fungus is often prized for its texture in sweet soups.
